title: Next.js Deployment Spec Simplifies Frontend Hosting
author: Loraine Lawson
description: Netlify took Next.js to task recently, claiming that it‘s difficult to deploy the framework. An adapter specification would change that.
cntitle: Next.js 部署规范简化前端托管
cndescription: Netlify 最近对 Next.js 提出了质疑，声称部署该框架很困难。一个适配器规范将会改变这种状况。[适配器规范](https://example.com)
